resources.string:
Dear Pritam's warden 
 I’m Octobud. I will help Pritam
 develop cognitive skills in relation to language. 

 This app has been designed to switch off 
 automatically after use for 20 minutes.
 The app cannot be reused unless there’s a gap of
 at least 3 hours.

Each tentacle has been designed to teach 
 a specific skill on being pressed.


The skills will be taught through audio visuals.


Each skill is taught at different levels.
 You can either choose a level as per your/your child’s 
 current development stage or start at level 1.

This Octobud has been designed specifically 
 for people with Down Syndrome. 
 It will accompany your child and aid your/his/her 
 cognitive development. 
 Please enter the 8 digit product code 
 (located behind the head of the Octobud) 
 of your child’s Octobud below.
